arts.ttl: Zlatan Ibrahimovic Heaps Praise on Milan Newcomers After Verona Win
arts.sum: Milan coach Sergio Conceicao was mourning as Zlatan Ibrahimovic addressed the media after a hard-earned 1-0 home win against Hellas Verona. During his brief chat with Sky Sport Italia via TWM, Ibrahimovic hailed the impact of winter signings. The post Zlatan Ibrahimovic Heaps Praise on Milan Newcomers After Verona Win appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
